reviews.get: SELECT reviews.id, reviews.title, reviews.content, reviews.date, reviews.rating, users.name, users.avatar FROM reviews INNER JOIN users ON reviews.user_id = users.id WHERE reviews.id = ?;
reviews.getAll: SELECT reviews.id, reviews.title, reviews.content, reviews.date, reviews.rating, users.name, users.avatar FROM reviews INNER JOIN users ON reviews.user_id = users.id
reviews.exists: SELECT reviews.id FROM reviews WHERE id = ?;
reviews.create: INSERT INTO reviews (user_id, title, content, date, rating) VALUES (?,?,?,NOW(),?);
